org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.swf

Class ShapeHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.swf.ShapeHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISWFConstants

    public class ShapeHelper
extends Object
implements ISWFConstants
    A collection of utilities to help create SWF Shapes and ShapeRecords.

    • Field Summary

      static List<ShapeRecord> cubicToQuadratic(double startX, double startY, double control1X, double control1Y, double control2X, double control2Y, double anchorX, double anchorY)
      Approximates a cubic Bezier as a series of 4 quadratic CurvedEdgeRecord with the method outlined by Timothee Groleau in ActionScript (which was based on Helen Triolo's approach of using Casteljau's approximation).
      static CurvedEdgeRecord curvedEdge(double startX, double startY, double controlX, double controlY, double anchorX, double anchorY)
      Creates a CurvedEdgeRecord to represent a quadratic curve by calculating the deltas between the start coordinates and the control point coordinates, and between the control point coordinates and the anchor coordinates.
      static Rect getBounds(List<ShapeRecord> records, LineStyle ls, AbstractStrokeNode strokeNode)
      Utility method that calculates the minimum bounding rectangle that encloses a list of ShapeRecords, taking into account the possible maximum stroke width of any of the supplied linestyles.
      static double getPointLength(org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.swf.ShapeHelper.Point p)
      Get length of a point.

      Creates a List of ShapeRecord to draw a line that represents an implicit closepath origin (startX, startY) to the specified coordinates (in pixels).

      Creates a List of ShapeRecord to draw a line from the given origin (startX, startY) to the specified coordinates (in pixels).

      Normalize a point.
      static List<ShapeRecord> path(PathNode node, boolean fill, Collection<ICompilerProblem> problems)
      Note this utility was ported to Java from the ActionScript class 'flex.graphics.Path' - specifically its 'data' property setter function.
      static List<ShapeRecord> rectangle(double width, double height)
      Creates a List of ShapeRecord to draw a rectangle from the origin (0.0, 0.0) for the specified width and height (in pixels).

      Creates a List of ShapeRecord to draw a rectangle from the given origin (startX, startY) for the specified width and height (in pixels).

      • line

        public static List<ShapeRecord> line(double startX,
                     double startY,
                     double endX,
                     double endY)
        Creates a List of ShapeRecord to draw a line from the given origin (startX, startY) to the specified coordinates (in pixels).
        Parameters:
        startX - The origin x coordinate in pixels.
        startY - The origin y coordinate in pixels.
        endX - The end x coordinate in pixels.
        endY - The end y coordinate in pixels.
        Returns:
        list of ShapeRecords representing the rectangle.

        Parameters:

        startY - The origin y coordinate in pixels.
        endX - The end x coordinate in pixels.
        endY - The end y coordinate in pixels.
        Returns:
        list of ShapeRecords representing the rectangle.

        startx - The origin x coordinate in pixels.
        starty - The origin y coordinate in pixels.
        width - The rectangle width in pixels.
        height - The rectangle width in pixels.
        radiusX - The radiusX for rounded corner in pixels
        radiusY - The radius for rounded corner in pixels
        Returns:
        list of ShapeRecords representing the rectangle.

      • setStyles

        public static void setStyles(List<ShapeRecord> shapeRecords,
             int lineStyleIndex,
             int fillStyle0Index,
             int fillStyle1Index,
             Styles styles)
        Sets the style information for the first StyleChangeRecord in a list of ShapeRecords.
        Parameters:
        shapeRecords - A list of shape records.
        lineStyleIndex - The ShapeWithStyle LineStyle index (starting at 1) or 0 if none.
        fillStyle0Index - The ShapeWithStyle FillStyle index (starting at 1) or 0 if none.
        fillStyle1Index - The ShapeWithStyle FillStyle index (starting at 1) or 0 if none.

        Parameters:

        lineStyleIndex - The ShapeWithStyle LineStyle index (starting at 1) or 0 if none.
        fillStyle0Index - The ShapeWithStyle FillStyle index (starting at 1) or 0 if none.
        fillStyle1Index - The ShapeWithStyle FillStyle index (starting at 1) or 0 if none.

        public static void replaceStyles(List<ShapeRecord> shapeRecords,
                 int lineStyleIndex,
                 int fillStyle0Index,

                 Styles styleContext)
        Replaces the style information for the all the StyleChangeRecords in a list of ShapeRecords.
        Parameters:

        lineStyleIndex - The ShapeWithStyle LineStyle index (starting at 1) or 0 if none.
        fillStyle0Index - The ShapeWithStyle FillStyle index (starting at 1) or 0 if none.
        fillStyle1Index - The ShapeWithStyle FillStyle index (starting at 1) or 0 if none.

      • move

        public static StyleChangeRecord move(double x,
                     double y)
        Creates a StyleChangeRecord to represent a move command without changing style information. All coordinates are to be specified in pixels and will be converted to twips.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate in pixels.
        y - The y coordinate in pixels.
        Returns:
        StyleChangeRecord recording the move and styles.

      • straightEdge

        public static List<ShapeRecord> straightEdge(double xFrom,
                             double yFrom,
                             double xTo,
                             double yTo)
        Creates a StraightEdgeRecord to represent a line as the delta between the pair of coordinates (xFrom,yFrom) and (xTo,yTo). All coordinates are to be specified in pixels and will be converted to twips.
        Parameters:
        xFrom - The start x coordinate in pixels.
        yFrom - The start y coordinate in pixels.
        xTo - The end x coordinate in pixels.
        yTo - The end y coordinate in pixels.

      • curvedEdge

        public static CurvedEdgeRecord curvedEdge(double startX,
                          double startY,
                          double controlX,
                          double controlY,
                          double anchorX,
                          double anchorY)
        Creates a CurvedEdgeRecord to represent a quadratic curve by calculating the deltas between the start coordinates and the control point coordinates, and between the control point coordinates and the anchor coordinates. All coordinates are to be specified in pixels and will be converted to twips.
        Parameters:
        startX - The start x coordinate in pixels.
        startY - The start y coordinate in pixels.
        controlX - The control point x coordinate in pixels.
        controlY - The control point y coordinate in pixels.
        anchorX - The anchor x coordinate in pixels.
        anchorY - The anchor y coordinate in pixels.
        Returns:
        CurvedEdgeRecord representing a quadratic curve.

      • cubicToQuadratic

        public static List<ShapeRecord> cubicToQuadratic(double startX,
                                 double startY,
                                 double control1X,
                                 double control1Y,
                                 double control2X,
                                 double control2Y,
                                 double anchorX,
                                 double anchorY)
        Approximates a cubic Bezier as a series of 4 quadratic CurvedEdgeRecord with the method outlined by Timothee Groleau in ActionScript (which was based on Helen Triolo's approach of using Casteljau's approximation). Using a fixed level of 4 quadratic curves should be a fast way of achieving a reasonable approximation of the original curve. All coordinates are to be specified in pixels and will be converted to twips.
        Parameters:
        startX - The start x coordinate in pixels.
        startY - The start y coordinate in pixels.
        control1X - The first control point x coordinate in pixels.
        control1Y - The first control point y coordinate in pixels.
        control2X - The second control point x coordinate in pixels.
        control2Y - The second control point y coordinate in pixels.
        anchorX - The anchor x coordinate in pixels.
        anchorY - The anchor y coordinate in pixels.
        Returns:
        a List of 4 CurvedEdgeRecords approximating the cubic Bezier. Cubic Bezier Curves in Flash

      • path

        public static List<ShapeRecord> path(PathNode node,
                     boolean fill,
                     Collection<ICompilerProblem> problems)
        Note this utility was ported to Java from the ActionScript class 'flex.graphics.Path' - specifically its 'data' property setter function.

      • getBounds

        public static Rect getBounds(List<ShapeRecord> records,
             LineStyle ls,
             AbstractStrokeNode strokeNode)
        Utility method that calculates the minimum bounding rectangle that encloses a list of ShapeRecords, taking into account the possible maximum stroke width of any of the supplied linestyles.
        Returns:
        bounding box rectangle.

      • normalize

        public static org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.swf.ShapeHelper.Point normalize(org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.swf.ShapeHelper.Point p,
                                                                    double length)
        Normalize a point. Scales the line segment between (0,0) and the current point to a set length. For example, if the current point is (0,5), and you normalize it to 1, the point returned is at (0,1).

      • getPointLength

        public static double getPointLength(org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.swf.ShapeHelper.Point p)
        Get length of a point.
